name: Trash Profits
description:
Buy trash bins take the items found in them. You can sell them directly or merge them in order to make a more valuable product. Buy upgrades or special items and make the most money out of trash. The more expensieve the bin is the more valuable objects it can contain.Think what objects are the most valuable because your inventory space is limited.

Instructions:Click on the buttons and press P for pause

Trash Profits was created for the Pompous Trash Jam 2021
